abstract.t: This document describes a qlog event schema containing concrete qlog event definitions and their metadata for the core QUIC protocol and selected extensions. Note to Readers Note to RFC editor: Please remove this section before publication. Feedback and discussion are welcome at https://github.com/quicwg/qlog (https://github.com/quicwg/qlog). Readers are advised to refer to the "editor's draft" at that URL for an up-to-date version of this document.
